thread.title: Zdeno Chara to miss Bruins' season opener | Bruins Insider |
thread.title_full: Zdeno Chara to miss Bruins' season opener | Bruins Insider | | Boston Herald

author: Steve Conroy
title: Zdeno Chara to miss Bruins' season opener | Bruins Insider |
text:
The Bruins will open their season tonight with their captain on the sidelines.
B's coach Claude Julien told reporters today that defenseman Zdeno Chara will miss tonight's game against the Winnipeg Jets. Chara remains day to day.
Chara is on injured reserve with an undisclosed upper body injury. He suffered the injury on Sept. 24 during the first few shifts of his first preseason game.
Chara skated with the team yesterday and came out early for power-play practice. He also stayed on the ice for a while after practice.
Julien said that Chara could potentially play in the next game. The coach said the veteran is still progressing and getting better every day.
